title: Fleet & Commercial Vehicle Insurance
summary: For lorry, tempo, taxi, and fleet operators across Chennai outskirts—focus on liability, downtime risk, and claim-ready documentation.

title: Contractors Plant & Machinery (CPM) Insurance
summary: Coverage guidance for JCB, excavator, crane, loader, and heavy equipment used in contracting and industrial work.

title: Warehouse / Godown Insurance (Fire & Burglary)
summary: For warehouses and godowns in industrial belts—fire, burglary, stock protection, and documentation discipline.

title: Marine Cargo / Transit Insurance (Import–Export & Local)
summary: Transit risk cover guidance for traders and logistics—invoice/packing list discipline and claim-ready steps.

title: Shopkeepers Insurance (Commercial Package)
summary: For SME shops and small offices—fire, burglary, stock cover and practical policy structuring guidance.

title: Car Insurance
summary: Coverage selection guidance for city driving—IDV basics, add-ons, renewals, and claim documentation tips.

title: Bike Insurance
summary: For daily riders—TP vs comprehensive, add-ons, and common claim mistakes to avoid.

title: Health / Mediclaim Insurance
summary: Guidance on waiting periods, room rent limits, network hospitals, and renewal continuity.
